name: Jukebox App
description: A simple music player app made with react.js with a spotify like design - ad free and open source.

name: Admin Workflow App
description: A project management system for companies. Log in as a project manager and create projects, assign a project to a team leader and add project duration, description, tasks and subtasks

name: Student Collaboration App
description: A student collab system for students to help with research. Log in as a student to find researchers in their field of interest, post questions on the community, answer questions posted in the community and find research papers using the google scholar api.

name: Rea Order App
description: A simple food ordering system for kasi fast food joints. Place your favourite meal order. Log in as the resturant admin to accept and prepare received orders.
